definition: A sweet, crystalline substance commonly used to enhance the taste of food and beverages. It is often added to coffee, tea, and baked goods to provide a pleasant sweetness.

examples.german: Ich mag meinen Kaffee ohne Zucker.
examples.english: I like my coffee without sugar.

examples.german: Zucker ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil vieler Lebensmittel.
examples.english: Sugar is an important component of many foods.
